name: Gal Pals in Space
description:
In this side-scrolling shoot-em-up inspired by arcade classics such as Galaga and Gradius, you play as Cassini and Nova--the Gal Pals in Space! In this pastel space adventure, you fly through an asteroid belt and an alien swarm to reach the end. Pick up shields to defend yourself, and shoot the aliens and meteors to clear your path! 

This game was created over the course of my senior year of high school as a year-long project for my computer science class.
